about_the_game:
WELCOME TO THE LOOP

You wake up passed out beside a hut. As afterimage of bright white light fades from view, a warrior in a grotesque mask approaches and greets you like an old friend. Faint, familiar memory begins to flood back as you realize something is very wrong...

Tides of Time is a 3rd person narrative action game. Missing your memory, explore the island you call home and rediscover it's inhabitants, what horrific fate has befallen the island, and defend your right to exist in this place. Using your words and your blade, get to know your fellow islanders and discover the mystery of the loop!

Engage In Combat
Many inhabitants of the island are dangerous, but all have a story to uncover, if you can withstand them long enough to learn it.

Explore the Island
Many secrets lurk in ancient forgotten places, waiting to be found before it's too late.

Repeat the Loop
There is no escape in death. Will you unravel the mysteries of the island, or will you be lost to infinity...
